decisions_made.question: Where to add test console log?

stories.title: Add console log to verify orchestrator works
stories.description: As a developer, I need a console log to verify the orchestrator agent can implement stories.
acceptance_criteria: Add console.log('Orchestrator test - US-001 complete') to src/routes/+page.svelte in onMount

stories.title: Remove test console log
stories.description: As a developer, I need to clean up the test console log after verification.
acceptance_criteria: Remove the console.log added in US-001 from src/routes/+page.svelte
